resources.string: confirm delete all card and image information?

Usage:
1. Enable module
2. Open the card package in the settings and find the card to be replaced, making sure to see the image that needs to be replaced
3. Go back to the application and refresh by pulling down
4. Click on the image to the right of the arrow when the target image appears, click the add image button in the middle to add the image, or select an existing image
5. Reopen the card package, and the image should have changed by now. 
Manual method: Open a file manager (such as MT file manager) and grant root permission. Copy the image to be replaced to
/data/data/com.zhizi42.diymiucard/files/images/
and
/data/data/com.miui.tsmclient/files/images/
, and modify the permission to be readable by anyone. Go back to the application and select the image or enter the full file name (including the suffix)
Don\'t filter small cards and logos now
Now will filter the small cards and logos
DIY MIUI Card v1.4,code by zhizi42(AI丿质子)
After opening, the icon of this application on the desktop will be hidden
Are you sure to hide the icon?

After enabling the hidden icon, the icon of this application on the desktop will disappear! From now on, you can only open this application by long pressing on it and selecting module settings within lsposed. You can turn off this option at any time to display the icon again.
This application has joined the no money plan and promises to be used for free without any additional features.
Open the website for the No Money Plan
Failed to open QQ, please check if the latest version of QQ is installed on your phone

Click on the image to select, click the \"Add Image\" button below to add an image (requires root permission), long press the image to delete it, and click \"Clear Selected\" to restore the original image
The application requires root permission to add images (copy images to the application\'s private directory), please grant root permission.
The file name to be saved already exists, please change the name
The image resolution is too low, and the final image effect may not be good
Crop to standard size and optionally add card logo
Copy file failed, please confirm granting root permission and contact the developer

Clicking confirm to add will add the current preview image style to the application card package image library.
At present, the one click add card face logo function only supports the Beijing Tianjin Hebei Interconnection Card, Shanghai Public Transport Card Traffic Union Edition, Quancheng Pass, and Yinchuan Transportation One Card.
Due to the author's limited skills and energy, they will not provide all transportation card faces and other card faces.
If you have the ability, you can take out the desired card logo image and hand it over to the author, who will add it to the application.

Are you sure you want to clear the image loading cache of yourself and your Xiaomi smart card and forcefully stop the Xiaomi smart card?\nClearing may correct image loading errors, but it will prolong loading time.\nAfter clearing, please restart this application for it to take effect.
Add image completed!\nIf the card surface of the card pack displays an error, it may be because you entered the same file name as before. You can update it by clearing the cache in the settings.
